attributes.action: Ban people from laying wooden floors in their property if it is above another property.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Wooden flooring in homes blights the lives of occupant's who have to live beneath it, as a result of the noise pollution it causes. Make it against the law, this will improve the quality of many people's lives, reduce neighbour disputes, and complaints & costs to local council.
